sys_soap_message.name: EzwimESMUsers
sys_soap_message.wsdl_xml:
<definitions name = "EzUser" targetNamespace = "http://integration.ezwim.com/wsdl/EzUser.wsdl" xmlns = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns = "http://integration.ezwim.com/wsdl/EzUser.wsdl" xmlns:xsd = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
<message name = "EzUserRequest"> <part name = "object" type = "xsd:string"/>
<part name = "reseller" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "company" type = "xsd:string"/>
<part name = "sysid" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "department" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "cost_center" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "email" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "employee_number" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "first_name" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "last_name" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "location" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "roles" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "name" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "user_name" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "active" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "mobile_phone" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "preferred_language" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "last_login" type = "xsd:string"/> </message>
<message name = "EzUserResponse"> <part name = "status" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "description" type = "xsd:string"/> <part name = "id" type = "xsd:string"/> </message>
<portType name = "EzUser_PortType"> <operation name = "sendUser"> <input message = "tns:EzUserRequest"/> <output message = "tns:EzUserResponse"/> </operation> </portType>
<binding name = "EzUser_Binding" type = "tns:EzUser_PortType"> <soap:binding style = "rpc" transport = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name = "sendUser"> <soap:operation soapAction = "sendUser"/> <input> <soap:body encodingStyle = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace = "urn:ezwim:ezuserservice" use = "encoded"/> </input>
<output> <soap:body encodingStyle = "http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" namespace = "urn:ezwim:ezuserservice" use = "encoded"/> </output> </operation> </binding>
<service name = "EzUser"> <documentation>WSDL File for Ezwim Users</documentation> <port binding = "tns:EzUser_Binding" name = "EzUser_Port"> <soap:address location = "http://integration.ezwim.com/senduser/" /> </port> </service> </definitions>
